Package ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.files

Interface WatchedFileListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GuidedMeditation, SavedSearch
public interface WatchedFileListener
An object that will listen for updates to a file on disk

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    start()
    Do any startup.
    void
    stop()
     
    Optional<Integer>
    update()
    Processed a changed file.

  • Method Details

    • start

      void start()
      Do any startup. Do not call update(); it will be called immediately after this method.

    • stop

      void stop()

    • update

      Optional<Integer> update()
      Processed a changed file.
      Returns:
      if empty, the file is assumed to be updated correctly; if a number is returned, this method will be called again in the specified number of minutes. This is useful if configuration talks to an external service which is failed.
